attributes.action: Start teaching children that responsibility is as important as rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All the children nowadays seem to be taught is that they have rights but don't seem to be aware that with these rights come certain responsibilities in order to contribute to society as a whole. This imbalance needs to be addressed or we will end up with socially inadequate adults when these rude, bad mannered kids mature.
